testcase.name: A customer recharge prepaid account from console using new credit card
testcase.system-out: Given Enter User name fnurani...............................................passed Then Enter Password comein22................................................passed Then Click on Login button..................................................passed Then Enter Greencode in Account reference field PAY-308.....................passed Then Click on Submit button.................................................passed Then Click on View invoice and prepaid detail...............................passed Then Click on prepaid account details.......................................passed Then Enter visa card owner name Test User - VISA............................passed Then Switch admin to iframe card number.....................................passed Then Enter credit card number 4111111111111111..............................passed Then Switch admin iframe to emp months......................................passed Then Enter expiry month 01..................................................passed Then Switch admin to iframe card expiry year................................passed Then Enter expiry year 2019.................................................passed Then Switch admin to iframe card cvv........................................passed Then Enter CVV 456..........................................................passed Then Enter amount in purchase credit field 10...............................passed Then Click on purchase credit button........................................passed Then Verify success message Credit purchased successfully...................passed
